title: Walmart’s Top U.S. E-Commerce Executive Is Leaving
sub_head: Casey Carl to depart after less than two years at Walmart; latest in a postholiday executive shuffle
body:
Walmart Inc.’s top U.S. e-commerce executive Casey Carl is leaving the retailer, according to an internal memo, adding to a string of recent executive shifts at the company.
Tom Ward, a senior vice president who has led Walmart’s efforts to use its stores as hubs for online pickup and delivery orders, will become the company’s new head of U.S. e-commerce, according to the memo sent Thursday and reviewed by The Wall Street Journal.
